name: frontend-template-vite
description: 前端專案共用腳手架 Vite
author: TZU-YEN, CHANG <try_love_tom@alljoint.tw>

scripts.dev:client: cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_URL=${API_URL:-http://localhost:7001} vite src/client --root src/client --port 3000 --config src/client/vite.config.js --open
scripts.dev:dashboard: cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_URL=${API_URL:-http://localhost:7001} vite src/dashboard --root src/dashboard --port 4200 --config src/dashboard/vite.config.js --open
scripts.build:client: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_URL=${API_URL:-http://localhost:7001} vite build src/client --root src/client --config src/client/vite.config.js --emptyOutDir
scripts.build:dashboard: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_URL=${API_URL:-http://localhost:7001} vite build src/dashboard --root src/dashboard --config src/dashboard/vite.config.js --emptyOutDir
scripts.analyse:client: cross-env NODE_ENV=production analyse=true vite build src/client --root src/client --config src/client/vite.config.js --emptyOutDir
scripts.analyse:dashboard: cross-env NODE_ENV=production analyse=true vite build src/dashboard --root src/dashboard --config src/dashboard/vite.config.js --emptyOutDir
